articles.description: Tennessee baseball's season came to an end against LSU on Tuesday night at the Men's College World Series in Omaha. Here's everything the Tigers said following the Vols' loss.
articles.content:
Q. Nate, I'm aware you were a starter at Eugene College back in Oklahoma. How much does that prepare you for this moment right now?
ACKENHAUSEN: It prepared me a lot. My first year I came out of the… [+1046 chars]

articles.content:

articles.author: , The Associated Press
articles.title: Wagging finger at Seattle Mariners, Cole leads Yankees to 3-1 win - Seattle Sports
articles.description: Gerrit Cole stared down José Caballero and wagged a finger at the Seattle Mariners’ dugout during the New York Yankees’ 3-1 win on Tuesday.
articles.content:
NEW YORK Gerrit Cole wagged a finger 15 times at Mariners manager Scott Servais and threw a pitch to José Caballero that landed high up on the backstop.
Coles message was clear: Dont mess with me.
